scenario.name: UAS
scenario.send: REGISTER sip:[$uas_number]@[$uas_domain] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: [$uas_number] <sip:[$uas_number]@[$uas_domain]>;tag=[pid] To: [$uas_number] <sip:[$uas_number]@[$uas_domain]> Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: [cseq] REGISTER Contact: [$uas_number] <sip:[$uas_number]@[local_ip]:[local_port]> Max-Forwards: 70 Subject: Performance Test Expires: 3600 Content-Type: application/sdp Content-Length: [len]

REGISTER sip:[$uas_number]@[$uas_domain] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: [$uas_number] <sip:[$uas_number]@[$uas_domain]>;tag=[pid] To: [$uas_number] <sip:[$uas_number]@[$uas_domain]> Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: [cseq] REGISTER Contact: [$uas_number] <sip:[$uas_number]@[local_ip]:[local_port]> Max-Forwards: 70 [authentication username="[$uas_number]" password="[$uas_passwd]"] Subject: Performance Test Expires: 3600 Content-Type: application/sdp Content-Length: [len]
